title: ANDRE WARD RECALLS FIRST LOSS & LAST OPPONENT TO BEAT HIM; EXPLAINS LOSING TO KOVALEV NOT AN OPTION
description: "I did...his mother was literally a judge...I lost my first fight, first ever fight...that's why I train the way that I train...I don't like to lose...I don't like what that feels like," ...
